German[edit]

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): [ˈdiːzən], [ˈdiːzn̩]
  • Audio
    		(file)
  • Hyphenation: die‧sen

Pronoun[edit]

diesen

  1. accusative masculine singular of dieser; "this"
    Ich will diesen Apfel - I want this apple.
  2. dative plural of dieser; "these"
    Ich half diesen Tieren - I helped these animals.

Spanish[edit]

Verb[edit]

diesen

  1. Second-person plural (ustedes) imperfect subjunctive form of dar.
  2. Third-person plural (ellos, ellas, also used with ustedes?) imperfect subjunctive form of dar.
